translated: The deepest gratitude of SaichÅ and others.
The virtue of the Langzhong's compassion.
Forever endless.
The use of the Dharma by sentient beings.
Never ending in the long night.
May the Dharma be transmitted and greatly illuminated.
May the lord's thoughts increase in merit.
May wisdom be perfected in an instant.
Then may it extend to all sentient beings in the ten directions.
May they all ride the single jeweled vehicle and travel together on the eightfold right path.
May enemies and friends be equal.
May self and others be united.
